General_Description: '''Battlefield Victories''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: On a [[message board]], Kassandra found a note about a contract: "[[Athens|Athenian]] forces are making an important push against [[Sparta]] in upcoming battles. They'll need support.
Section_Outcome: Kassandra aided Athens in conquest battles, gaining rewards for doing this.
Section_Behind_the_scenes: This very same contract appears also under the names [[Raging War]] and [[To Hell and Back]].
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
